title: Galle Face: Protests still continue despite rain
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Protest opposite the Presidents office is still continuing despite heavy rains.
Amidst the rains this morning, protestors have remained continuing the protest which commenced around 9.00am yesterday (09).
According to our correspondent, there is a massive traffic congestion centered around the protest site as well.
HRCSL requests MoD to provide statement regarding State of Emergency
